title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday, 23 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: uk goes to the eu referendum polls .
harrison in england team for aussie game .

documents.title: live updates have finished for today
text: we 'll be back tomorrow from 06:00 with the results of the eu referendum .
see you then .

documents.title: weather : rain tonight , sunshine tomorrow
text: tonight there will be thunderstorms with locally heavy rain and lightning .
lows of 15c ( 59f ) .
a dry start to the day with some early sunshine and highs of 22c ( 72f ) .
you can find more details on the bbc weather website .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: adminstrator says theatre closure is 'tragic ' but business is not 'viable '
text: gary pettit , from the administrators of the castle theatre , has described the 31 redundancies resulting from its closure as `` tragic '' .
however , he said the venue `` is not a viable business as a theatre on it 's own , it needs other services '' .
mr pettit said he been speaking with seven parties about the running of the theatre and `` if the council are prepared to work with one of those '' it could reopen .
he also confirmed anyone with tickets for future events at the theatre in wellingborough will get a refund .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: play abandoned at arundel in county championship
text: play abandoned for the day at arundel .
@ twitterid 142/2 trailing @ twitterid by 36 # bbccricket

documents.title: the 'travelling morrice ' comes to northamptonshire
text: cambridge morris men , known at the 'travelling morrice ' have come to perform in northamptonshire as part of their summer tour .
i paid them a visit in badby
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: wilson hopes 'things get sorted ' after pulling out of tournament
text: kettering snooker player kyren wilson has been forced to pull out of this week 's riga masters in latvia , according to the northamptonshire telegraph .
wilson is suffering from a potential blood clot in his left leg and chose to withdraw from the first major competition of the season .
he has tweeted his thanks for the support received .
thanks for everyone 's messages !
hopefully things get sorted so i can crack on with the new season
hey kyren hope get well soon lovely snooker player sure i can see you next world cup reaching final round i really trust it gl
take care kyren .
i hope you 'll be back playing soon !

documents.title: council to get theatre 'back up and running again ' in weeks
text: in a statement , the borough council of wellingborough has said it is `` already working on how to reopen [ the castle ] in a matter of weeks '' , despite the administrator saying it could take two years for the theatre to reopen .
the authority also says if it can rebook any community events which have been cancelled then fees to rehire the castle would be waived .

the statement says the authority `` has been fully supportive of the venue and continues to be fully supportive of it , '' adding it is `` taking the operation back in house for an interim period so that it can get it back up and running again '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: castle theatre closure confirmed
text: it has been confirmed the castle in wellingborough is to close with 31 members of staff made redundant .
the administrators say there has been a lot of interest shown in taking the theatre forward and non-disclosure agreements were issued to those parties interested .
however , there are some complex legal and constitutional issues that have prevented them from proceeding .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu referendum : pens now alright in east northants
text: pen or pencil ?
both are fine now according to east northants council
2/2 pencils have always been provided at polling stations for voters use
why ca n't you just provide biros ?
ball point pens .

just filled out my passport forms in pencil better safe than sorry

documents.title: rain halts strong session for northamptonshire
text: unfortunately it is lashing down with rain at arundel .
i know this does n't show it , but i promise you that it is .
that 's why the covers are on .
the rain looks set for a couple of hours , which is a pity for northants who were in a strong position at 142-2 trailing by by only 36 runs with captain alex wakely 46 not out .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: 'no pride ' in northampton cemetery , says man whose wife is buried there
text: kelvin muddiman , whose wife is buried at dallington cemertery , says it 's been left in such a bad state he and his family have resorted to cutting the grass around her grave themselves .
he says the people who are meant to maintain the cemetery need to do better .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: man 'let down ' by council over state of northampton cemetery
text: dallington cemetery in northampton is in a `` disgusting condition , '' according to a man angry with the state of his wife 's grave .
kelvin muddiman 's wife was laid to rest at dallington nearly seven years ago .
he said he and other mourners are being let down by northampton borough council and their contractors .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: racism victims in grassroots football 'do n't feel confident ' in authorities to deal with it
text: racism on the pitch is still a problem in grassroots football , according to a lecturer at the university of northampton .
dr jim lusted chairs the grassroots guidance group for the `` kick it out '' campaign .

he spoke at a special conference held at the university yesterday and said victims `` do n't feel confident in the authorities dealing with incidents '' and referees `` do n't feel comfortable '' in reporting racism .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: harrison is an `` excellent defender and robust , '' says jones
text: england coach eddie jones said teimana harrison , who is set to get his second england cap against australia on saturday , is a `` bit of a street-fighter '' .
jones said : `` he does n't mind throwing it around a bit and we 're going to need that on saturday .
he 's nice and competitive in that seven spot . ''
jones said harrison had trained well throughout the tour and deserved his opportunity .
`` he 's an excellent defender and his robustness will be important to us at the start of the game . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

he 's taken to twitter to show his thanks for the fans support .

documents.title: cobblers close to signing former peterborough defender
text: northampton town are close to signing former peterborough defender gaby zakuani .
the 29-year-old dr congo centre-back was released by posh at the end of the season after making 252 appearances in two spells , having initially joined them in 2008 .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: northamptonshire reaches 500 first-class cricketers
text: sean terry became northamptonshire 's 500 first-class cricketers during the game against sussex , which started yesterday .
past players to grace the shirt include frank tyson , allan lamb and colin milburn .
here are a few more of the 500
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: council says it will receive castle theatre back - but do n't know when it might re-open
text: the borough council of wellingborough has told me `` it does appear that in the near future the council will receive the building back '' .
it goes on to say before it could re-open the theatre `` a number of housekeeping and legal processes '' would have to carried out .
the authority also says it hope to be able to help any local groups which have had shows cancelled to have an opportunity to perform .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: all castle theatre shows have been cancelled
text: i 've now found out all shows at the castle in wellingborough have been cancelled with immediate effect .
the administrators decided last night that it was no longer able to honour existing bookings .
they had previously said they would honour all pre-booked shows until september , but today it announced that was no longer possible .
it 's understood the news means 30 staff at the venue have been made redundant .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: castle theatre in wellingborough 'expected to close '
text: a post on the save the castle , wellingborough facebook group says it expects the theatre to close later today .
the theatre is expected to shut after the eu referendum voting .
it is currently operating as a polling station .
the theatre was placed in administration back in april , but it was hoped it could carry on operating until a new organisation to run it was found .
i am hoping to speak to the administrators later today and also a dance group who have had their show cancelled .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: very high pollen levels today
text: sorry hayfever sufferers
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: county championship : azharullah puts northamptonshire in command at sussex
text: azharullah 's 6-68 gave northamptonshire the upper hand on day one of their division two encounter with sussex yesterday .
rain prevented play until 14:30 at arundel , two and a half hours after the scheduled 12:00 start .
northants bowled first having elected not to contest the toss .
azharullah took the first six wickets to fall to reduce sussex to 139-6 .
only chris nash ( 75 ) offered real resistance as the hosts were all out for 178 , with northants 43-1 in reply .
ollie robinson struck to bowl rob newton for a 24-ball duck , but ben duckett and alex wakely held on until the close , which came just before 20:00 because of bad light .
plus will resume told at 12:00 and there will be commentary online with me then .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: england v australia : teimana harrison starts in third test
text: northampton flanker teimana harrison will start for england in saturday 's third test against australia as eddie jones ' men aim for a whitewash .
harrison , 23 , who made his debut against wales in may , replaces the injured james haskell .
the rest of the england squad remains unchanged with dylan hartley captaining the side and courtney lawes and paul hill on the bench .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: weather : warm sunshine for most
text: it 's set to be a fine day with sunny spells .
however , cloud will build through the afternoon , leading to a risk of showers or thunderstorms by the late afternoon or evening .
top temperature of 23c ( 73f ) .
here 's my full forecast
there are more details on the bbc weather website .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: eu referendum : what happens after i vote ?
text: once polling stations close across the county at 10:00 the counting begins .
each district and borough council will declare its result and send them on to kettering .
then we 'll have a result for northamptonshire , and for the east midlands .
that result will be sent to manchester , where the country-wide result will be collated .
as for when we 'll get some results , we are really not sure - but we 're guessing sometime between 02:00 and 06:00 on friday morning .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: eu referendum : smiley faces ok - but not advised - but selfies are 'strongly discouraged '
text: the electoral commission says the best way to make sure your vote is counted is to mark an x in a box .
but a smiley face or anything interpreted by a returning officer as an expression of preference `` must not be rejected if the voter 's intention is clear '' , guidance to counting officers says .

although there 's nothing legally specifically banning taking photos , the electoral commission strongly discourages photography inside a polling station , including selfies , `` as you might find yourself in breach of secrecy of the ballot requirements '' .
anyone who inadvertently reveals how someone else votes could face a £ 5,000 fine or six months in prison .
consequently , you will see `` no photography '' signs inside many polling stations .
the commission advises it would be better to take a photo outside the polling station to use on social media .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu referendum : how do i vote ?
text: you will be given a ballot paper listing two options : `` remain a member of the european union '' or `` leave the european union '' .
it will be printed on special paper or feature an official mark or number to combat fraud .
put an x in the box which reflects your choice .
if you mark any more boxes , your paper will be invalid .
fold the ballot paper so others can not see your choice and post it in the ballot box .
if you make a mistake you can get your ballot paper reissued , so long as you have not put it in the ballot box .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu referendum : where do i vote ?
text: if you are on the electoral register , you should have received a polling card through the post which has your name , polling number and the address of your polling station printed on it .
you do not need to take your polling card with you when you vote , but you must only vote at the polling station to which you have assigned .
any voter who has not had a chance to post their postal vote ( if they have asked for one ) can still take it to their polling station in person .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu referendum : when can i vote and what are we voting for ?
text: today uk will go the polls in the eu referendum .
the polls opened at 07:00 and will close at 22:00 .
provided you are at the polling station at 22:00 , you will be guaranteed the opportunity to vote .
the referendum will decide whether the uk should leave or remain in the european union .
you will be asked to answer the following question : `` should the united kingdom remain a member of the european union or leave the european union ? ''
whichever side gets more than half of all votes cast is considered to have won .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: welcome to thursday 's live page for northamptonshire
text: good morning .
between now and 18:00 we 'll be bringing you news , weather , sport and travel updates for the county .
we 'll start with today 's vote on the eu referendum
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
